name: Duelist

actions.name: Rapier
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit  reach 5 ft.  one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

reactions.name: Riposte
reactions.desc: When the duelist is missed by a melee attack by an attacker they can see within 5 feet, the duelist makes a rapier attack against the attacker with advantage.

document__title: Level Up Advanced 5e Monstrous Menagerie OGL
